name: Dune/Drift
description:
Guide your hovercraft through the desert ruins in search of lost treasures...

Created for TOJAM 12, Dune/Drift was designed to work with a customized Arduino board control scheme: Two dials would independently control the output of the two engines. The controls have since been adjusted to work with keyboard inputs.

________________________________________

Post-TOJAM Changes:

  • Fixed issue with enemy turrets not firing at times
  • Reworked level layout to make more interesting & compact
